description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

TURN YOUR UDEMY COURSE INTO A KINDLE BOOK

Everyone who joins Udemy and tastes the small success bits wants more...

Did you also have this feeling?

- I want to be involved more into the community

- I want to contribute more...

This exact feeling I had when I've started looking for other platforms where I can share my knowledge, outside Udemy.

I assume you have published a course on Udemy already...and perhaps doing well, is that it?

Wait...there is also Amazon Kindle. Why don't we explore it as our next step to online success?

To be honest, only after I've started publishing on Amazon, I've noticed how similar the Amazon concept is to Udemy. Amazon is somebody's main income, but for us, Udemy Instructors, it could become the second income stream.

I've heard some people say that instead of them paying to Google $1 per click, they prefer to get paid by Amazon $1 and get a quality lead. So, maybe Amazon will help you get more students to your Udemy course...or Udemy will help you to sell more of your books.

In any case, I think recycling the content is important, especially for infopreneurs. Interested to get started?

In this course I will show you everything you need to publish your book in the next 3 days. That's right! 3 days! Why? Because I've published my book in 3 days.

However, because we are converting the course into a book, I assume you already have your content ready. If you don't you will get also some idea on how to get started.

This is again a screen record course, which means you will see everything I do on my screen. So, let's get started. Hit the 'Start Learning Now' button and I will see you on the other side!
title: Turn Your Udemy Course into a Kindle Book - Unofficial
